name: Select.Root

disabled.description: Whether or not the select menu is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the select menu is disabled.

multiple.description: Whether or not the select menu allows multiple selections.
multiple.description_zh: Whether or not the select menu allows multiple selections.

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body when the menu is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: Whether or not to prevent scrolling the body when the menu is open.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the select menu when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: Whether to close the select menu when the escape key is pressed.

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether to close the select menu when a click occurs outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: Whether to close the select menu when a click occurs outside of it.

loop.description: Whether or not to loop through the menu items when navigating with the keyboard.
loop.description_zh: Whether or not to loop through the menu items when navigating with the keyboard.

open.description: The open state of the select menu.
open.description_zh: The open state of the select menu.

onOpenChange.description: A callback that is fired when the select menu's open state changes.
onOpenChange.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the select menu's open state changes.

selected.description: The value of the currently selected item.
selected.description_zh: The value of the currently selected item.

onSelectedChange.description: A callback that is fired when the select menu's value changes.
onSelectedChange.description_zh: A callback that is fired when the select menu's value changes.

portal.description: Where to render the select menu when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: Where to render the select menu when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null

highlightOnHover.description: Whether or not to highlight the currently hovered item.
highlightOnHover.description_zh: Whether or not to highlight the currently hovered item.

name.description: The name to apply to the hidden input element for form submission.
name.description_zh: The name to apply to the hidden input element for form submission.

required.description: Whether or not the select menu is required.
required.description_zh: Whether or not the select menu is required.

scrollAlignment.description: The alignment of the highlighted item when scrolling.
scrollAlignment.description_zh: The alignment of the highlighted item when scrolling.

typeahead.description: Whether or not to enable typeahead functionality. When enabled, the user can type to navigate to menu items.
typeahead.description_zh: Whether or not to enable typeahead functionality. When enabled, the user can type to navigate to menu items.

items.description: An array of items to add type-safety to the onSelectedChange callback.
items.description_zh: An array of items to add type-safety to the onSelectedChange callback.

onOutsideClick.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
onOutsideClick.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

description: The root select component which manages & scopes the state of the select.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
